FormattedText.htmlText: Hi, in this tutorial, we will learn how to design viz frame charts. Unlike Viz charts, Vizframe charts are a bit different. SAP no longer supports Viz charts, it emphasize developers to use VizFrame, since viz charts are now depreciated since 1.32.0, are no longer actively developed and won’t be getting any new features. VizFrame is available in sap.viz.ui5.controls. We will go through this new control with the help of a simple example of a bar chart depicting the no. of cars bought on an yearly basis.
